title: Naked News for Indie Authors: How NOT to Invest Your Marketing $$$
description:
Librarian Note: The latest edition with updated cover of this title can be found HERE 
In this new book “Naked News for Indie Authors: How NOT to Invest Your Marketing $$$” marketing expert, email evangelist, and indie author Gisela Hausmann reveals how indie authors can avoid wasting time and money. She also offers free and/or cheap alternatives to many common marketing methods and myths. The book includes five helpful illustrations. Content: Overcoming your biggest disappointments The Flipside of this Wisdom Find a Publisher or Self-Publish Facts to Consider BEFORE Trying to Find a Publisher Direct Marketing E-Mails Can Lead to Making Great Business Contacts – Or Not! Newsletter Marketing “… Use a Template to Contact Book Reviewers and/or Book Bloggers…” “… Get as Many Reviews as Possible…” “… Hire a Publicist…” “… Get Book Reviews via Review Swaps…” “…To Succeed you Need to Find a Profitable Book Niche…” “… List a Giveaway on Goodreads and everbody Will Start Talking About Your Book…” Book Promotion Programs, Tools, or Products” “Where Should I Start?” Other helpful books from this author “Naked Words: The Effective 157-Word Email” “Naked Truths About Book Reviews” “Naked News: How to Get on TV”
author: Gisela Hausmann
